update sys_user_execute set username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, realname = #{realname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mac = #{mac,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, company = #{company,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, head_img_url = #{headImgUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, usertype = #{usertype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, operate_id = #{operateId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, province = #{province,jdbcType=BIGINT}, city = #{city,jdbcType=BIGINT}, region = #{region,jdbcType=BIGINT}, street = #{street,jdbcType=BIGINT}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, login_ip = #{loginIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, login_time = #{loginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, default_page = #{defaultPage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, device_id = #{deviceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, system_version= #{systemVersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select a.id, a.username, a.password, a.realname, a.mobile, a.company, a.head_img_url, a.usertype, a.operate_id, a.status, a.province, a.city, a.region, a.street, a.remark, a.login_ip, a.login_time, a.default_page, a.create_time, a.update_time, b.media_name,a.device_id,a.system_version from sys_user_execute a left join sys_user c on a.operate_id = c.id left join ad_media b on b.user_id = c.id where 1=1 and a.id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select a.id,a.realname from sys_user_execute a left join ad_media b on b.user_id = a.operate_id where b.id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select id from sys_user_execute where username = #{username}
and id <> #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
